episodes.title: Child Trafficking & Cult Survivor Exposes Corrupt Nonprofits: The 10 Rules of Every Cult #Awareness
episodes.description:
In this powerful and eye-opening TikTok Live replay, Kim Kelley, a survivor of child trafficking and cult abuse, uncovers the truth behind corrupt nonprofits and cults posing as part of the solution. Kim shares her experiences working undercover to expose these organizations, revealing their harmful practices and how they exploit the very people they claim to help.

Watch as Kim breaks down The 10 Rules of Every Cult and provides awareness and practical action steps to help you identify and avoid supporting organizations that are actually part of the problem. During the Q&A, Kim also dives deep into topics such as:

 • Healing from childhood trauma
 • Her perspective on religion after surviving a cult
 • What it’s like working undercover to expose corruption
 • How the public can help survivors in meaningful ways

This is a must-watch for anyone passionate about protecting the innocent and making a difference in the world.

episodes.title: Uncovering the Truth: Are Nonprofits Really Helping? 💰 Real Talk with Dr. Nicole Prause & Kim Kelley
episodes.description:
🚨 Real Talk: Where’s the Money Really Going? 🚨⁣
⁣
In this recent podcast, Dr. Nicole Prause and Kim Kelley dive deep into the uncomfortable truth: 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘰𝘳𝘨𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴 𝘤𝘭𝘢𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘰 “𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘱” 𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘭𝘺 𝘴𝘰𝘭𝘷𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘴𝘴𝘶𝘦𝘴. Many are collecting millions, but are they really making an impact? 🤔⁣
⁣
Too often, we see:⁣
⚠️ Re-traumatizing victims instead of providing real support⁣
⚠️ Hiring “experts” without proper credentials in the field⁣
⚠️ Ignoring root causes, while funneling funds elsewhere⁣
⚠️ A focus on PR, fundraising, and lobbying instead of comprehensive solutions⁣
⁣
⁣
𝐈𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐲’𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦, 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐲’𝐫𝐞 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦.⁣
Do you agree?⁣
⁣
⁣
Watch our full discussion on YouTube and join us in calling for accountability and real, impactful solutions. 🔗⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#FollowTheMoney #NonprofitAccountability #RealSolutions #NicolePrause #FactOverFear

episodes.title: Are Anti-Exploitation Groups Really Solving the Problem? 🤔
episodes.description:
When organizations collect millions in the name of solving child exploitation but don’t make a measurable impact, they become part of the problem. 💰✨

If even HALF of the groups out there were truly effective, would child exploitation still be a $50B+ criminal enterprise in the U.S. alone? 🤔

It’s time to start questioning: Are these groups really solving the problem, or are they exploiting it? 🚨

Time to pull back the curtain! 🎬  Head to @MeanMachineRadio YouTube channel for the full story. 🎧


#FightForChange #Accountability #StopExploitation #NonProfitTransparency #ProtectOurKids #MeasurableResults #TruthMatters #MeanMachineRadio

episodes.title: OnlyFans Model Debunks Myths About Adult Content & Safety: @Alyssamagnumexclusive  & Kim Kelley
episodes.description:
In this eye-opening interview, Kim Kelley sits down with OnlyFans model Alyssa Magnum @Alyssamagnumexclusive  to explore the reality of adult content creation. Alyssa shares her journey, insights into managing boundaries, and tackles the myths around exploitation in the industry. Together, they discuss how platforms like OnlyFans can improve content moderation and protect minors while giving tips for parents on safeguarding children from potential online risks.

Tune in for an honest conversation about life as an adult content creator, safety challenges, and practical ways to protect young people in the digital age.

🔑 Key Topics:
• Myths and realities of adult content creation
• Balancing personal life with a public persona
• OnlyFans’ role in protecting minors
• Digital safety tips for parents

👉 Get informed with this in-depth perspective on a controversial industry!

#OnlyFansModel #AlyssaMagnum #DigitalSafety #MythDebunking #KimKelley #AdultContent #OnlineSafety #ProtectingMinors

episodes.title: Dr. Nicole Prause Exposes the Truth: Science vs. Myths on Adult Content & Trafficking
episodes.description:
In this exclusive interview with Dr. Nicole Prause, a leading UCLA neuroscientist, published researcher, and licensed psychologist, we break down the facts vs. fiction when it comes to adult sexuality, trafficking, and child exploitation.

Dr. Prause uncovers what *legitimate* scientific research says about p🔞rnography and challenges the misconceptions many anti-p🔞rn organizations push in the name of combatting trafficking.

Are these groups truly solving problems and helping survivors, or is there more to the story? 🧐

She also dives into the millions these groups collect, their real impact, and the intimidation tactics they use.

🔑 Key Takeaways:
• What science says about p🔞rn’s effects
• Are anti-p🔞rn groups helping or hurting?
• Is p🔞rn a cause or symptom of a bigger issue?
• Real problems and real solutions (vs exploiting the problem)

If you’re ready to confront the truth 🎧 watch the full interview on YouTube and join the conversation!

#ScienceFacts #FactsOverFear #PublishedResearch #ScienceEducation #OnlineSafety #RealScience #FactsOverFeelings

episodes.title: Former OnlyFans Recruiter : Protecting Innocence in the Digital Age | Kim Kelley & Victoria Sinis
episodes.description:
Join Kim Kelley, founder of Digital Defenders United, and Victoria Sinis from Creating Gems, as they dive deep into the root causes of child exploitation and the critical role of digital safety. This insightful discussion covers:

🔹 The cultural influence of social media and its role in sexualizing young people
🔹 How grooming works and its devastating impact on children
🔹 Parental responsibilities and practical tips for online safety
🔹 The responsibility influencers and tech companies have in safeguarding minors
🔹 Real-world solutions for a safer digital world

Kim and Victoria also share their experiences working with influencers, tech giants, and advocacy groups, offering tangible strategies for change. Whether you’re a parent, educator, or simply concerned about the online safety of children, this conversation is a must-watch.

Watch the full episode and learn how we can all work together to protect kids online. 💻👧👦

📺 Subscribe to Digital Defenders United for more discussions on digital safety, exploitation prevention, and advocacy.

#DigitalSafety #ChildExploitation #OnlineSafety #ProtectOurKids #TechResponsibility #InfluencersImpact #SafeInternet #DigitalDefenders

episodes.title: How to Be Your Child's Accountability Partner Online
episodes.description:
Are you actively involved in your child’s digital world? 📱 Being aware of what apps they use, what chats they engage in, and the content they post is crucial in today’s connected age. It’s not about being overly strict, but about creating an environment of trust and accountability.

As Mark Stross shared in our live discussion, “Debunking Digital Safety Myths,” staying involved without immediate judgment helps your child self-correct and fosters open dialogue. You want to be their accountability partner, setting the example they’ll learn from and follow.

Tip: Get involved in their world by exploring the same platforms, talking about their online interactions, and setting the tone by allowing them to see your online behavior too. Mutual accountability is key! 🙌

Watch the full discussion on YouTube.

#DigitalSafety #ParentingIn2024 #ProtectOurKids #OnlineSafety #Accountability #ParentingWin #TechTalk #FamilySafety

episodes.title: 🚨 Parents, This Internet Danger Could Be Harming Your Child!
episodes.description:
🚨 Parents, this is crucial! 🚨 Please don’t give your child 𝘶𝘯𝘭𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘵𝘦𝘥, 𝘶𝘯𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘷𝘪𝘴𝘦𝘥 access to the internet. In today’s world, a device in their hands connects them to the entire online world—and that doesn’t always mean safety. Just because they’re upstairs in their bedroom doesn’t mean they’re protected if they’re online.⁣
⁣
We’ve seen the dangers firsthand, and we’re not exaggerating. Predators are migrating to where your kids are—online. It’s easy to think about the dangers of strangers in the park, but we also need to shift our focus to the digital strangers they meet on their devices.⁣
⁣
And as parents, we need to recognize the new risks of the digital age. We must teach our kids to be just as alert online as we do with strangers in person. The truth is, they can be exposed to more people—and risks—in the safety of their own room than they ever were at school or in the neighborhood.⁣
⁣
So let’s get real, have these conversations, and protect our kids in this digital world. 🌐💻🛡️⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#ChildSafety #DigitalSafety #OnlinePredators #ProtectOurKids #DigitalParenting #InternetSafety #ParentalAwareness #CyberSafety #TraffickingAwareness

episodes.title: Debunking Digital Safety Myths: How to Protect Your Kids Online | Kim Kelley & Mark Stross
episodes.description:
In this insightful and must-watch discussion, Kim Kelley and technologist Mark Stross break down the most common myths surrounding digital safety and how parents can protect their children in the online world. From the concept of “technoference” to the role big tech platforms play, this video covers the realities of digital life in 2024. Learn practical steps to safeguard your family and build trust with your children by staying involved in their digital experiences.

Key topics:

 • Myths vs. Facts in digital safety
 • Parental guidance on online activity
 • The influence of technology (“technoference”)
 • Big tech’s role in child protection
 • Realistic action steps for families

Don’t miss the chance to equip yourself with tools and knowledge to protect your kids online. Watch the full video now and join the conversation in the comments!

📲 Watch Now and subscribe for more digital safety tips.


#DigitalSafety #OnlineSafety #ParentingTips #TechSafety #ChildProtection #DigitalAgeParenting #ProtectOurKids #MarkStross #KimKelley #BigTechResponsibility

episodes.title: Instagram’s New Teen Accounts: A Big Win for Online Safety!
episodes.description:
What do you think of Instagram’s new “Teen Accounts” that (finally) limit who can contact them and what content they see while enhancing parental monitoring? 👏👏👏

We’ve been advocating for stricter built-in protections for years, especially with the surge of harmful content on these platforms. It’s a positive step, but the battle for digital safety is far from over.

My thoughts:

1️⃣ If the platform itself acknowledges the need for safeguards, it’s a wake-up call to take online safety more seriously than ever!

2️⃣ It’s about time! Meta’s platforms, including Instagram, have been among the highest reported for hosting inappropriate and harmful content, so seeing proactive measures for minors is a win for all parents.

2️⃣ It’s 👏 about 👏 time! 👏 This is a big step in the right direction, I love to see it!
Meta’s platforms have consistently been among the highest reported for hosting inappropriate and harmful content—particularly CSAM—so seeing proactive measures for minors is a win for humanity.

What are your thoughts on these changes? Let’s discuss👇

#DigitalSafety #TeenAccounts #ParentingIn2024 #ProtectOurKids #OnlineSafety #InstaSafety #SafeInternet #MetaChanges #ParentingWin

episodes.title: Digital 3xpl0itAtion: What Parents Need to Know
episodes.description:
🚨 What Every Parent Needs to Know: trafficking isn’t always like the movies. These days, predators and harmful influences can reach children right in their own homes through their devices. It’s happening 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘺𝘸𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦, including communities across America.

As parents, it’s our job to stay informed and proactive about these digital threats, because exploitation doesn’t just happen overseas—it could be happening right in your neighborhood.

Join the conversation with Mikayla from Shared Hope International to uncover what exploitation looks like in today’s world and how you can safeguard your children from these digital dangers. 📲🛡️

👀 Watch the full discussion on our YouTube channel to learn more about:
• Key signs to watch for 🚩
• Practical solutions to keep your kids safe
• Resources for upgrading your family’s digital safety 🔐

Let’s come together to protect the next generation! 💪👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
⁣
⁣
⁣
#ProtectOurKids #ChildSafety #DigitalSafety #StopTrafficking #SharedHopeInternational #ParentalControl #OnlineSafety #CommunityAwareness #DigitalDefendersUnited #StaySafeOnline #ProtectTheInnocent

episodes.title: 🚨 Predators Are Online: How to Protect Your Kids in the Digital Age 📱
episodes.description:
🚨 Attention Parents! 🚨 @SharedHopeInternational’s PSA sends a powerful wake-up call. Predators don’t need white vans anymore—they’re reaching our kids through their electronic devices. 📱💻

Unsupervised, unlimited access to the internet exposes children to harmful content and dangerous strangers. But we can change that. 🛑

It’s crucial we set boundaries, talk openly with our kids about the risks, and stay engaged in their online lives.

👀 Let’s take action together to create safer online spaces for our children. The digital world brings a new dynamic to the equation, and our responsibility to monitor and protect them has never been more important.

episodes.title: What Does the Research Really Say About Porn? | Dr. Nicole Prause Debunks Anti-Porn Myths
episodes.description:
In this enlightening interview, Kim Kelley sits down with Dr. Nicole Prause, a renowned neuroscientist and licensed psychologist, to dive deep into the scientific research on pornography. Dr. Prause discusses the facts behind the claims, the misconceptions perpetuated by anti-porn organizations, and how some of these groups disguise themselves as anti-trafficking advocates. Are they really helping survivors? And where do their millions of dollars in donations go?

Dr. Prause also opens up about the threats and intimidation tactics used by these organizations, the impact of misinformation, and what her research truly reveals about porn and its effects on mental health.

🔑 Key Topics Covered:
• What scientific research says about pornography
• Are anti-porn groups helping or hurting the cause?
• Is porn is a symptom or the root cause?
• What are the real problems, and the real solutions?

Watch the full interview to uncover the truth, based on facts, not fear. Stay informed and get a balanced perspective.

🔔 Don’t forget to like, share, and subscribe for more insightful discussions on protecting digital safety and the latest research.

#DigitalSafety #NicolePrause #PornResearch #ScientificFacts #DebunkingMyths #AntiPornOrganizations #MentalHealth #SexualHealth #DigitalDefendersUnited #FactBasedDiscussion

episodes.title: 🚨 Protecting Kids Online: Simplifying Algorithms for Safety 🚨
episodes.description:
The internet can be a dangerous place for kids who don’t understand the long-term impact of what they’re exposed to. So how do we keep them safe? It’s not just up to big tech—we all have a role to play in protecting our children online.

One important step forward is the Senate’s new bill that proposes to allow turning off algorithms on kids’ accounts, keeping searches limited to what they are actually looking for instead of veering off into inappropriate content.

This “dumbing down” of the algorithm is crucial in preserving innocence. Kids don’t know what they don’t know—and by controlling what they see, we can help protect their innocence and finally take a step towards breaking the digital addiction cycle.

Let’s be proactive, stay informed, and demand more protective measures for our children online. 📲✨

#ProtectOurKids #DigitalSafety #TechForGood #SafeInternet #AlgorithmControl #ProtectInnocence #OnlineSafety #InformedParenting #SenateBill

episodes.title: Digital Threats & Child Safety Beyond the White Van: With Shared Hope International
episodes.description:
In this important livestream, child safety advocate Kim Kelley founder of Digital Defenders United joins forces with Mikayla Simeral, Senior Manager of Training and Promotions at Shared Hope International, to expose the hidden dangers of child exploitation in the digital age.

The internet is the new “white van,” with traffickers and predators exploiting online platforms to groom and manipulate children. Together, Kim and Mikayla will discuss Shared Hope’s “White Van Campaign: Know the Signs Online” and share actionable strategies to protect kids from online predators. Learn about the realities of digital exploitation, how human trafficking is happening behind closed doors without moving children physically, and what parents and caregivers can do to prevent this growing threat.

Stay informed and empowered with tips and tools from experts fighting on the front lines of child protection.

Key Takeaways:

 • Understand how traffickers use digital platforms to exploit children.
 • Learn how to spot the warning signs of online grooming.
 • Discover how Shared Hope’s “White Van Campaign” is shifting the narrative around human trafficking.
 • Get practical advice on how to keep children safe online.

📅 Date: Tues, Sept 10
🕒 Time: 12pm PST / 3 EST

Join the conversation and let’s work together to safeguard our children in this digital age. Don’t miss this important discussion!

#ChildSafety #DigitalSafety #WhiteVanCampaign #HumanTraffickingAwareness #ProtectOurKids #OnlineSafety #SharedHopeInternational #DigitalDefendersUnited #StaySafeOnline

episodes.title: Digital Defenders United Live Stream
Why We Need a Digital Bill of Rights: Protecting Our Kids & Reclaiming Our Privacy
episodes.description:
In today’s digital age, our children are more connected than ever—but this also means they face unprecedented risks. Big Tech companies profit from our data and our children’s engagement, often without enough safeguards. It’s time to demand change! 📲⚠️

Why We Need a Digital Bill of Rights 📜:
We believe in a future where we own our data and have the right to withdraw consent whenever we want. Imagine having control over your information and being able to say, “I don’t want my data out there anymore.” It’s about empowerment, privacy, and safety. 🙌

But it doesn’t stop there. We must hold Big Tech accountable for protecting children online. Our kids deserve a safe digital environment where their privacy is respected, their data is secure, and they are shielded from harmful content. 🛡️

This isn’t just about tech—it’s about standing up for our kids’ futures. By advocating for a Digital Bill of Rights, we can push for transparency, accountability, and ethical standards from tech giants. This is our chance to create a safer, better internet for the next generation! 🚸💪

Join us in this fight! Let’s raise our voices and demand a safer digital world for everyone. 🌐

👉 Watch the full discussion on our profile now, and check out Mark Stross’ book “Killer Tech & the Drive to Save Humanity” to learn more about the proposed Digital Bill of Rights and solutions to protect your family in this digital age. 📚

#DigitalRights #DataPrivacy #ProtectOurKids #TechAccountability #OnlineSafety #ChildProtection #DigitalSafety #ConsentMatters

episodes.title: 🚨 Urgent Reality Check: Protecting Our Children from Online Dangers
episodes.description:
🚨 Urgent Reality Check: The Dangers Lurking Online for Our Children 🚨

Every day, countless children innocently stumble into the digital hunting grounds of online predators. These interactions can have lasting, irreparable impacts on their innocence and safety. We're not exaggerating—the threat is real, immediate, and devastating.

🛡️ Protection is Paramount: As guardians of the next generation, it’s our duty to shield them from these hidden dangers. It's a harsh reality, but in the digital world, predators are just a click away from our kids.

💔 Rapid Predation: The speed at which a child can be exposed to harmful content or manipulative individuals is staggering. Our mission at Digital Defenders United is to implement robust safeguards and educate both children and parents about these risks.

🤝 Join the Fight: Together, we can create a fortress of safety around our children. It’s not enough to be aware; we must take proactive steps to ensure no child falls prey to exploitation.

🎥 Learn more about how you can protect your children and join our cause. Awareness is the first step to prevention. Let’s turn our collective concern into action. Visit our website and watch our resources on combating online threats. We must protect our children.

#ProtectOurKids #OnlineSafety #ChildProtection #EndExploitation #CyberSafety #DigitalGuardians #SafeInternet #FightPredators

episodes.description:

Discover the proactive measures that impressed Adam and learn how Aylo’s commitment to trust and safety goes beyond just complying with legal requirements.

In this revealing discussion, you’ll hear:

 • How Aylo treats AI-generated and virtual depictions of harmful content
 • Insights into Aylo’s rigorous verification and content moderation processes
 • The significant impact of Aylo’s collaboration with organizations like the Cupcake Girls

This clip sheds light on the real efforts being made to protect the innocent online.

episodes.title: 🚨 DOJ's 30-Month Probe Revealed: Aylo’s Battle Against CSAM & The Future of Online Safety 🛡️
episodes.description:
🚨 Unpacking the DOJ’s 30-Month Investigation & Findings 🚨
Soloman Friedman, one of the owners of Ethical Capital Partners, Aylo’s parent company, broke down the truth behind the headlines and discussed the measures Aylo has taken to eradicate CSAM on all their sites.

Are these actions enough to set a new standard for online safety? 🛡️
Are other platforms doing their part to protect our children? 🧐

This is a conversation you don’t want to miss. Watch the full discussion on YouTube where we tackle the hard questions, uncover the facts, and discuss what really needs to be done to make the internet a safer place for all.

We invite you to read the public documents, and join the conversation. It’s time to look beyond the headlines, understand the complexities, and explore what really needs to be done to make the internet safer for everyone.

Let’s push for real change together. 💪✨

episodes.title: DOJ's Findings: 30 Month Investigation of Aylo & PornHub | Exclusive with Soloman Friedman ECP
episodes.description:
In this podcast clip, former law enforcement officer Adam Boyd interviews Solomon Friedman and Sarah Bain, executives at Aylo (formerly MindGeek), as they dive deep into the Department of Justice’s findings from a 30-month investigation. Discover how Aylo’s rigorous trust and safety protocols have been acknowledged by the DOJ, and learn the truth behind the deferred prosecution agreement.

In this insightful discussion, you’ll hear:

 • The tragic case of fraudulent documentation by a rogue studio
 • Why the DOJ cleared Aylo of involvement in illegal sex trafficking
 • Aylo’s groundbreaking commitment to trust, safety, and victim compensation
 • The proactive steps Aylo is taking to lead the industry in online safety

Watch the full version here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DfQ8p0M_fM&t=1470s

This is a must-watch for anyone concerned about digital safety and the measures being implemented to protect the most vulnerable online.

episodes.title: A Call to Unite for Child Safety Online : Let's Work Together to Solve This Problem
episodes.description:
Welcome to the Digital Defenders United channel, where we're committed to protecting our children in the digital age. Join Kim Kelley, founder of Digital Defenders United, as she explores our critical mission and calls for collective action to safeguard the innocence and security of children online.

🔍 About This Video:
In today's digital landscape, the safety of our children is often overshadowed by rapid technological advancements. Digital Defenders United is at the forefront of advocating for robust protective measures online. In this video, Kim Kelley discusses:

The urgent need for comprehensive solutions to combat online threats to children.
Our collaborative efforts with tech giants, legal experts, and community leaders to forge a safer digital environment.
How you can be a part of this vital movement to ensure our children's future is secure and nurturing.

Your involvement can make a real difference. Learn about the tools and strategies we implement to combat online exploitation and how you can contribute to making the internet a safer place for our youngest users.

📞 Get Involved:
Whether you're a parent, educator, tech professional, or concerned citizen, your voice is crucial. Reach out, participate in our events, and spread the word. Together, we can turn the tide against online threats to children.

✅ Subscribe and Share:
Don't forget to subscribe to our channel and share this video to help amplify our message. Every share counts in building a community dedicated to the safety of children online.

#ChildSafety #DigitalDefenders #OnlineSafety #ProtectOurKids #TechForGood #CommunityAction #DigitalCitizenship #KimKelley

episodes.title: Protect Your Kids Online: Essential Tips for Proactive Parenting in the Digital Age
episodes.description:
🚨 Stay Proactive, Stay Informed! Constantly monitoring your child’s online activities is crucial in today’s hyper-connected world. 📱💻

Predators often use seemingly innocent platforms, like gaming and social media, as gateways to access their victims. It’s not just about setting boundaries—it’s about having open and sometimes uncomfortable conversations much earlier than you might expect. 🛡️

🔍 Did you know? The national average age of entry into s3x trafficking is now 13 years old, and it’s decreasing. Awareness and proactive parenting are key to safeguarding our children from such threats.

Let’s empower ourselves with knowledge and tools to protect our young ones.

Join us in creating a safer digital environment for our kids. Every action counts. ❤️

episodes.title: 💡 Why are we working with Ethical Capital Partners (ECP)?
episodes.description:
Let’s dive deep into this unconventional but vital alliance to protect the innocent.

As leaders in adult digital content, ECP’s platforms are setting unprecedented standards in tech safety—standards that many ‘family-friendly’ platforms have yet to meet. Our mission? To thoroughly assess ECP’s tech safeguards, identify potential improvements, and advocate for broader industry adoption of these vital protections.🛡️

We aim to set a benchmark for tech giants everywhere, ensuring they adopt robust measures to shield their platforms from exploitation and safeguard the innocence of users. This collaboration isn’t just about making incremental changes; it’s about transformative solutions that can redefine digital safety standards globally.

🤔 Imagine this: There’s significantly more exploitative content on everyday platforms like this one, than on adult sites like P🔞rnHub. If they can enforce zero tolerance and robust safeguards, why can’t others? 🧐

Join us as we navigate this complex terrain and advocate for substantial, industry-wide changes. Let’s transform how tech companies manage content and protect users.

🎥 Check out our full discussion on YouTube to learn more about the steps we’re taking and the changes we’re pushing for in the tech world.

episodes.title: Creating a Safer Digital World for Our Kids: Get Involved, Stay Informed, Take Action 🛡️
episodes.description:
In today’s digital age, protecting our children online must be a shared responsibility. We all must be willing to get involved, stay informed, and take appropriate action to ensure their safety. 🛡️

🔍 Get Involved: Monitor your children’s online activity. Know their friends, their online habits, the content they’re consuming, and the pictures and videos they’re sending and receiving.

📚 Be Informed: Understand the apps, games, and devices your children are using. Educate yourself about the potential risks and how to navigate them.

🗣️ Take Action: Set clear boundaries and guidelines. Use parental controls, have open conversations about online dangers, and encourage safe online practices.

Together, we can create a safer digital world for our kids. Let’s commit to being proactive and protective. 💪❤️

#ProtectOurKids #OnlineSafety #ParentalResponsibility #DigitalParenting #StayInformed #BeInvolved #TakeAction #SafeInternet #TechForGood #MarkStross

episodes.title: 🚨 Meet Detective Heidi Chance: 27 Years Fighting Human Trafficking 🛡️
episodes.description:
Detective Heidi Chance has over 27 years of experience in combating human trafficking and exploitation. Heidi’s expertise, passion, and shared commitment to protecting children in the digital realm, educating parents, and working with law enforcement to implement solutions is a true inspiration. 🛡️👮‍♀️

Her profound experience and commitment to justice don’t just stop at enforcement—Heidi is also a pivotal educator, shaping the next generation of law enforcement with her expert knowledge on combating these heinous crimes. As the founder of A Chance for Awareness, she educates law enforcement and the public on recognizing and combating exploitation through various platforms, including her website and engaging training sessions.

Her unparalleled insights, leadership, and passion will guide our strategies in making the internet a safer place for our children. Together, we can dismantle the networks that threaten their innocence. 🌐💪
